priceListGroupList.description: List of Price List Groups associated with the site including default Price List Group

deleted.description: true if priceListGroup is deleted otherwise false

displayName.description: The display name of the price list group

repositoryId.description: The priceListGroup id associated with the site.

active.description: true if priceListGroup is active otherwise false

currency.description: The currency of the price list group

displayName.description: The display name of the currency

repositoryId.description: The repository id of the currency

fractionalDigits.description: The fractional digits allowed in the currency

numericCode.description: The numeric code representing the currency

id.description: The priceListGroup id associated with site.

locale.description: The locale associated with the price list group

productionURL.description: The production base url for storefront. If set, this base url will be used for any absolute generated links e.g. sitemap urls

secondaryCurrency.description: Currency used for calculating shipping and tax for loyalty.

defaultCatalog.description: The default catalog associated with the site

repositoryId.description: The repository id of the catalog

rootCategories.description: The root categories of the default catalog

longDescription.description: The long description of the category

categoryImages.description: The array of image URLs associated with the category

displayName.description: The display name of the category

categoryPaths.description: The category paths of the category

categoryIdPaths.description: The ids of the paths associated with the category

repositoryId.description: The repository id of the child categories

fixedParentCategories.description: The array of the fixed parent categories.

repositoryId.description: The repository id of the child categories

creationDate.description: The ISO 8601 date representing the creation date of the category

repositoryId.description: The repository id of the category

allRootCategories.description: The array of all root categories

defaultAccessLevel.description: The default access level of the site

endecaSiteId.description: The endeca site associated with this site

timeToLive.description: The hold price time value in milliseconds.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the author

displayName.description: The display name of the country

repositoryId.description: The repository id of the country

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate between the selected priceListGroup's currency code and the site currency code

maxCouponsPerOrder.description: Maximum coupons allowed per order (null if not applicable)

paymentGateways.description: The array of the payment gateway names

siteIcon.description: The URL of the site icon

additionalProductionURLs.description: The array of additional production URLs

repositoryId.description: Repository id of the default sale price list
Repository id of the default sale price list

recommendationsHost.description: The host name of the recommendations server.

allowedOriginMethods.description: Map of hostname (key) and the allowed http methods (values) for that host.
